channel.title: Stockwatch - Key Events
channel.description: Real-time corporate announcements, deals, and financial results.

item.title: [FINKURVE] Finkurve Financial Services Reschedules Board Meeting to Consider Funds Raising via Private Placement
item.description:
Finkurve Financial Services Ltd. has informed the BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors, originally scheduled for February 09, 2026, to consider and approve the raising of funds through the issuance of Non-Convertible Debentures, has been rescheduled to February 11, 2026, due to certain technical issues. The debentures will have a face value and issue price of Rs. 10,000 (Indian Rupees Ten Thousand only) each, and will be issued via the Electronic Bidding Platform (EBP) through private placement.

  • Finkurve Financial Services Ltd. reschedules Board meeting to February 11, 2026
  • Meeting originally scheduled for February 09, 2026, to consider and approve funds raising through Non-Convertible Debentures issuance
  • Debentures to have a face value and issue price of Rs. 10,000 (Indian Rupees Ten Thousand only) each
  • Issuance to be carried out via Electronic Bidding Platform (EBP) through private placement
  • Rescheduling due to technical issues

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Finkurve Financial Services Ltd | Category: Investment

item.title: [HPAL] HP Adhesives Ltd Schedules Board Meeting to Approve Q3 and Nine Months Results for 2025
item.description:
HP Adhesives Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors is scheduled on 12th February 2026. The meeting will consider and approve the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2025. The trading window for Designated/Connected Persons and their immediate relatives will be closed till 48 hours after the announcement of financial results.

  • HP Adhesives Ltd board meeting scheduled on 12th February 2026
  • Unaudited Financial Results for Q3 and nine months of 2025 to be considered and approved
  • Trading window for Designated/Connected Persons and their immediate relatives to be closed till 48 hours after the announcement of financial results

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: HP Adhesives Ltd | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [AIRAN] Airan Ltd to Approve Q3 & Nine Months Financial Results on Feb 14, 2026
item.description:
Airan Ltd has announced a Board meeting on February 14, 2026, to consider and approve the unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025. The trading window for dealing in the securities of the company is closed for the insiders from January 1, 2026, till 48 hours after the declaration of financial results.

  • Airan Ltd to consider and approve the unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025.
  • Trading window for dealing in the securities of the company is closed for the insiders from January 1, 2026, till 48 hours after the declaration of financial results.

Company: Airan Ltd | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [HERITGFOOD] Heritage Foods Ltd Vice President Marketing, Puneet Kusumbia, Resigns
item.description:
Heritage Foods Ltd has informed about the resignation of Mr. Puneet Kusumbia, Vice President (Marketing) and Senior Management Personnel (SMP), due to personal reasons. The resignation is accepted and he will be relieved from his duties on or before May 5, 2026. The decision details are provided in accordance with Regulation 30 read with Schedule III - Para A(7C) of Part A of the SEBI Listing Regulations.

  • Heritage Foods Ltd Vice President (Marketing) Mr. Puneet Kusumbia has resigned.
  • The resignation is due to personal reasons.
  • The resignation is accepted and he will be relieved from his duties on or before May 5, 2026.
  • The decision is in compliance with Regulation 30 read with Schedule III - Para A(7C) of Part A of the SEBI Listing Regulations.
  • Heritage Foods Ltd is an ISO 22000 certified company.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Heritage Foods Limited | Category: Management Change

item.title: [SURYAAMBA] Suryaamba Spinning Mills Ltd to Approve Q3 and Nine Months Financial Results on February 14, 2026
item.description:
Suryaamba Spinning Mills Ltd has announced that its Board of Directors will meet on February 14, 2026, to consider and approve the unaudited financial results for the third quarter and nine months ended on December 31, 2025. The meeting will also take note of the Limited Review Report of the Statutory Auditor on the unaudited financial results. The company's trading window will remain closed until 48 hours after the declaration of the financial results.

  • Suryaamba Spinning Mills Ltd to approve Q3 and nine months financial results on February 14, 2026
  • The meeting will consider and approve the unaudited financial results for the period ended on December 31, 2025
  • The company's trading window will be closed until 48 hours after the declaration of the financial results

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: SURYAAMBA SPINNING MILLS LTD. | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [BAJEL] Bajel Projects Secures a Large Order for 765kV Mandsaur Substation Extension
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Bajel Projects Limited, a leading player in the Power Transmission and Distribution (T&D) EPC sector and a Bajaj Group company, has been awarded a â€˜Largeâ€™ order for the extension of the Mandsaur Pooling Station (PS). This project is a critical component of Indiaâ€™s strategy to augment transformation capacity for Renewable Energy (RE) interconnection. The contract, designated as 765kV AIS Extn. Substation Package SS 108T, involves the extension of the existing 765/400/220kV Mandsaur Pooling Station (PS) under the 'Augmentation of Transformation Capacity and Implementation of line bays at Mandsaur for RE interconnection' and is being executed through the Tariff Based Competitive Bidding (TBCB) route. The Company is already executing the transmission line of 260 route kms from Beawar to Mandsaur Pooling station traversing through Madhya Pradesh and Rajasthan.

  • Bajel Projects Limited has secured a â€˜Largeâ€™ order for the extension of the Mandsaur Pooling Station (PS).
  • The project is a critical component of Indiaâ€™s strategy to augment transformation capacity for Renewable Energy (RE) interconnection.
  • The contract, designated as 765kV AIS Extn. Substation Package SS 108T, involves the extension of the existing 765/400/220kV Mandsaur Pooling Station (PS).
  • The project falls under the 'Augmentation of Transformation Capacity and Implementation of line bays at Mandsaur for RE interconnection' and is being executed through the Tariff Based Competitive Bidding (TBCB) route.
  • Bajel Projects is already executing the transmission line of 260 route kms from Beawar to Mandsaur Pooling station traversing through Madhya Pradesh and Rajasthan.

item.title: [VEERHEALTH] Veerhealth Care Ltd to Approve Q3 and Nine Months Results on Feb 14, 2026
item.description:
Veerhealth Care Ltd has announced that its Board of Directors will meet on February 14, 2026, to consider and approve the unaudited financial results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025. The meeting will be held at the company's registered office in Mumbai. The trading window for dealing in the securities of the company, which was closed from January 1, 2026, will be reopened on February 17, 2026, in accordance with the SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading Regulations), 2015.

  • Veerhealth Care Ltd to approve Q3 and nine months results on Feb 14, 2026
  • The meeting will be held at the company's registered office in Mumbai
  • Trading window for dealing in the securities of the company to be reopened on Feb 17, 2026

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Veerhealth Care Limited | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [DIVSHKT] Divyashakti Ltd. Approves Unaudited Financial Results for Q3 2025
item.description:
Divyashakti Ltd. held a Board Meeting on 06th February 2026 to approve the unaudited financial results for the quarter ended 31st December 2025. The meeting was conducted in accordance with the SEBI LODR Regulations. The Board approved the unaudited financial results as reviewed by the Audit Committee and recommended by the Statutory Auditors M/s Pavuluri & Co Chartered Accountants, Hyderabad.

  • Approval of unaudited financial results for Q3 2025
  • Review and approval by the Audit Committee and the Board of Directors
  • Approval of Limited Review Reports by the Statutory Auditors

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Divyashakti Ltd | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [ENERGYINF] Energy Infrastructure Trust Approves Q3 and Nine Months Financial Results for 2025
item.description:
Energy Infrastructure Trust, managed by EnCap Investment Manager Private Limited, has approved the un-audited standalone and consolidated financial results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025. The results were reviewed by Deloitte Haskins & Sells LLP. The Trust's total income stands at INR 848.61 crore, with a net profit of INR 650.19 crore. The Trust's net distributable cash flows (NDCF) for the quarter ended December 31, 2025, is INR 2.28 crore.

  • Energy Infrastructure Trust approves Q3 and nine months financial results for 2025
  • Total income stands at INR 848.61 crore
  • Net profit for the period is INR 650.19 crore
  • Net distributable cash flows (NDCF) for the quarter ended December 31, 2025, is INR 2.28 crore
  • Reviewed by Deloitte Haskins & Sells LLP

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Energy Infrastructure Trust | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [POLYLINK] Polylink Polymers India Ltd Approves Quarterly Financial Results for Q4 2025
item.description:
Polylink Polymers India Ltd has approved the Quarterly Financial Results for the quarter ended 31st December 2025. The un-audited financial results and the limited review report for the quarter ended 31st December 2025 were issued by M/s. K. N. Gutgutia & Co. Chartered Accountants, Statutory Auditors of the Company.

  • Polylink Polymers India Ltd has approved the Quarterly Financial Results for Q4 2025.
  • The un-audited financial results for the quarter ended 31st December 2025 were reviewed by M/s. K. N. Gutgutia & Co. Chartered Accountants.
  • The financial results are in compliance with Regulation 33 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations.
